SENT.plain: CT examinations were performed in 12 cases with histological proved Burkitt lymphoma
10 cases showed an abdominal manifestation, 1 patient has had mediastinal and neck lymph node enlargements, and in 1 case an involvement of the maxilla was seen
CT revealed the precise localisation, size and extension of the disease
Particularly CT has been very useful for the posttherapeutic assessment, for measuring the tumor response and for detection of a tumor relapse
